message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity. I'm willing to let it go for $20,000.
I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.  This is a fair price, considering its value to me.
I understand that $20,000 might be a bit steep, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I'm still not able to go that high. How about we settle on $15,000? It's a fair price for both of us and gets us closer to a deal.
